Package io.servicetalk.http.api

Interface HttpSerializationProvider

@Deprecated public interface HttpSerializationProvider
Deprecated.
Use HttpSerializers, HttpSerializer2, HttpDeserializer2, HttpStreamingSerializer, and HttpStreamingDeserializer.
A provider of HttpSerializers and HttpDeserializers.

  • Method Details

    • serializerFor

      <T> HttpSerializer<T> serializerFor(Class<T> type)
      Deprecated.
      Get a HttpSerializer for a Class of type HttpSerializationProvider.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to serialize.
      Parameters:
      type - The Class type that the returned HttpSerializer can serialize.
      Returns:
      a HttpSerializer for a Class of type HttpSerializationProvider.

    • serializerFor

      <T> HttpSerializer<T> serializerFor(Class<T> type, IntUnaryOperator bytesEstimator)
      Deprecated.
      Get a HttpSerializer for a Class of type HttpSerializationProvider.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to serialize.
      Parameters:
      type - The Class type that the returned HttpSerializer can serialize.
      bytesEstimator - An IntUnaryOperator that given the last serialized size in bytes, estimates the size of the next object to be serialized in bytes.
      Returns:
      a HttpSerializer for a Class of type HttpSerializationProvider.

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      type - The TypeHolder type that the returned HttpSerializer can serialize.
      bytesEstimator - An IntUnaryOperator that given the last serialized size in bytes, estimates the size of the next object to be serialized in bytes.

      a HttpSerializer for a TypeHolder of type HttpSerializationProvider.

      Get a HttpDeserializer for a Class of type HttpSerializationProvider.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to serialize.
      Parameters:
      type - The Class type that the return value will serialize.
      Returns:
      a HttpDeserializer for a Class of type HttpSerializationProvider.
